wepppy.climates.cligen.cligen.df_to_prn(df, prn_fn, p_key, tmax_key, tmin_key)¶

creates a prn file containing daily timeseries data for input to cligen

columns are formatted as {month} {day} {year} {p_in_tenthinches} {tmax} {tmin}
